title: Strengthening AI Practical Skills: Collaborative Language Learning Design in Spatial Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use 20 basic target language sentence patterns through paired collaborative inquiry tasks in a 360° virtual environment
Learners maintain an achievement rate of 80% or higher in the appropriateness of language expression by utilizing peer assessment rubrics in the collaborative learning process.
Learners maintain communication participation with a social presence scale (SPS) score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in digital learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
